quote: To be totally at leisure for one day is to be immortal for one day.  – Chinese Proverb
fact: There are more psychoanalysts per capita in Buenos Aires than any other place in the world.
joke: Yesterday, I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I’m okay, but I feel like I’ve dyed a little inside.
